Package spas

Interface Summary
IBundle A bundle of sensory stimulations.
IObservation An observation holds the significant consequences that the enacted interaction had on the spatial system.
IPlace A place is a location in the local space that holds a placeable item (stimulation, salience, or bundle).
ISpas The spatial system.
IStimulation An sensory stimulation is a basic element of Ernest's sensory system.
 

Class Summary
Bundle A bundle of sensory stimulations.
LocalSpaceMemory The local space structure maintains an awareness of the bundle surrounding Ernest.
Observation An observation holds the significant consequences that the enacted interaction had on the spatial system.
PersistenceMemory Maintains the memory of bundles.
Place A place is a location in the local space that holds a bundle.
Spas The spatial system.
Stimulation A sensory stimulation.
